Generated Narrative: ValueSet smoking-status-type-code

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    401201003Cigarette pack-years (observable entity)
    782516008Number of calculated pack years for cumulative lifetime tobacco exposure (observable entity)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    72166-2Tobacco smoking status
    11367-0History of Tobacco use
